communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act, I hereby request the following records:

Insurance premiums and coverages for risk/tort insurance; policy numbers, coverage limits, premimiums.  what insurance agency it's through and what part of it is self insured and what part is not self insured by the municipality or county.   Torts tort coverage amounts per incident.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

john Doe

title: FOIA to Moore County Public Safety Office, Deputy Scot Brooks

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Dear Deputy Brooks:

	We represent the Estate of Ramzan Daraev, who was shot and killed on May 3, 2024, at or around 1660 Dowd Road, in Carthage, North Carolina.  Under the North Carolina Public Records Law, G.S. §132-1., I am requesting an opportunity to inspect or obtain copies of public records that include:

a.	All dash-cam video footage for all police cruisers involved in this incident from 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024 including but not limited to cruisers involved in the initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

b.	All body-worn camera (BCW) video footage for all police officers involved in this incident from 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, including but not limited to cruisers involved in the initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

c.	All public or private video footage that captures the time period of 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

d.	All radio transmissions from 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, to and from any police officer involved in the initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

e.	All text messages, Instant Messages, or WhatsApp messages, from 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, to and from any police officer involved in the initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

f.	All 911 Call Recordings from 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, regarding the incident, initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

g.	All Moore County Sheriff GPS information and reports regarding any police cruiser(s) involved in the initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

h.	All reports, supplemental reports, findings, notes, memorandum, emails, transcripts, communications, or any other documentation regarding the investigation of the incident detailed above; 

i.	All records from EMS Ambulance Unit M50, related to Ramzan Daraev, from the incident on May 3, 2024.

j.	All records from Fire Station 31F, related to Ramzan Daraev, from the incident on May 3, 2024. 

k.	All records from the North Carolina Office of the Chief Medical Examiner, related to the investigation of the death of Ramzan Daraev on May 3, 2024.

l.	All records indicating the chain of custody of the cell phone and vehicle, and any other personal belongings of Ramzan Daraev, as well as the current location of these items.

	If there are any fees for searching or copying these records, please inform me if the cost will exceed $500.  However, I would also like to request a waiver of all fees in that the disclosure of the requested information is in the public interest and will contribute significantly to the public’s understanding of the shooting and death of Ramzan Daraev.  This information is not being sought for commercial purposes.
The law requires that you respond to and fulfill this request "as promptly as possible."  If you expect a significant delay in responding to and fulfilling this request, please contact me with information about when I might expect copies or the ability to inspect the requested records.
If you deny any or all of this request, please cite each specific exemption you feel justifies the refusal to release the information and notify me of the appeal procedures available to me under the law.

Thank you for considering my request.

Sincerely,


/s/Michael L. Gallagher
Michael L. Gallagher

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Michael L. Gallagher, Gallagher Law Offices, LLC

title: FOIA Request to Moore County Sheriff's Office - May 3, 2024 Shooting of Ramzan Daraev

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the North Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Dear Sir or Madam:

	We represent the Estate of Ramzan Daraev, who was shot and killed on May 3, 2024, at or around 1660 Dowd Road, in Carthage, North Carolina.  Under the North Carolina Public Records Law, G.S. §132-1., I am requesting an opportunity to inspect or obtain copies of public records that include:

a.	All body-worn camera (BCW) video footage for all police officers involved in this incident from 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, including but not limited to cruisers involved in the initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

b.	All public or private video footage that captures the time period of 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

c.	All radio transmissions from 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, to and from any police officer involved in the initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

d.	All text messages, Instant Messages, or WhatsApp messages, from 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, to and from any police officer involved in the initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

e.	All 911 Call Recordings from 18:00 on May 3, 2024, to 23:00 on May 4, 2024, regarding the incident, initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

f.	All Moore County Sheriff GPS information and reports regarding any police cruiser(s) involved in the initial investigation, or response to the incident detailed above;

g.	All reports, supplemental reports, findings, notes, memorandum, emails, transcripts, communications, or any other documentation regarding the investigation of the incident detailed above; 

h.	All records from EMS Ambulance Unit M50, related to Ramzan Daraev, from the incident on May 3, 2024.

i.	All records from Fire Station 31F, related to Ramzan Daraev, from the incident on May 3, 2024. 

j.	All records from the North Carolina Office of the Chief Medical Examiner, related to the investigation of the death of Ramzan Daraev on May 3, 2024.

k.	All records indicating the chain of custody of the cell phone and vehicle, and any other personal belongings of Ramzan Daraev, as well as the current location of these items.

	If there are any fees for searching or copying these records, please inform me if the cost will exceed $500.  However, I would also like to request a waiver of all fees in that the disclosure of the requested information is in the public interest and will contribute significantly to the public’s understanding of the shooting and death of Ramzan Daraev.  This information is not being sought for commercial purposes.
The law requires that you respond to and fulfill this request "as promptly as possible."  If you expect a significant delay in responding to and fulfilling this request, please contact me with information about when I might expect copies or the ability to inspect the requested records.
If you deny any or all of this request, please cite each specific exemption you feel justifies the refusal to release the information and notify me of the appeal procedures available to me under the law. Thank you for considering my request. 
Sincerely,

Michael L. Gallagher

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Michael L. Gallagher, Gallagher Law Offices, LLC
